sourcesContent:
import {UPDATE_DRIVER} from "../actions/types"
import {UPDATE_KART} from "../actions/types"
import {UPDATE_TIRE} from "../actions/types"
import {UPDATE_GLIDER} from "../actions/types"
import MKData from "../assets/MK8-data.js"

const initialState = [
    driver = {
        id: 41,
        name: "Mario",
        type: "driver",
        img: "MK8_Mario_Icon.png",
        wg: 6,
        ac: 2,
        on: 4,
        of: 2,
        mt: 2,
        sl: 6,
        sw: 6,
        sa: 6,
        sg: 6,
        tl: 4,
        tw: 4,
        ta: 4,
        tg: 4
    },
    kart = {
        id: 1,
        name: "Standard Kart",
        type: "kart",
        img: "StandardKartBodyMK8.png",
        wg: 2,
        ac: 4,
        on: 3,
        of: 3,
        mt: 4,
        sl: 3,
        sw: 3,
        sa: 3,
        sg: 3,
        tl: 3,
        tw: 2,
        ta: 3,
        tg: 3
    },
    tire = {
        id: 84,
        name: "Standard",
        type: "tire",
        img: "StandardTiresMK8.png",
        wg: 2,
        ac: 4,
        on: 2,
        of: 5,
        mt: 3,
        sl: 2,
        sw: 3,
        sa: 2,
        sg: 3,
        tl: 3,
        tw: 3,
        ta: 3,
        tg: 3
    },
    glider = {
        id: 105,
        name: "Super Glider",
        type: "glider",
        img: "SuperGliderMK8.png",
        wg: 1,
        ac: 1,
        on: 1,
        of: 1,
        mt: 1,
        sl: 1,
        sw: 1,
        sa: 0,
        sg: 2,
        tl: 1,
        tw: 0,
        ta: 1,
        tg: 1
    }
]

const builderReducer = (state=initialState, action) => {
    switch(action.type){
        case UPDATE_DRIVER:
            console.log(action.driverID)
            
            return {
                ...state
                // driver: MKData.filter(item => {
                //     return action.driverID === item.id
                // })
            }
        case UPDATE_KART:
            // console.log(action.kartID)
            return {
                ...state
            }
        case UPDATE_TIRE:
            // console.log(action.tireID)
            return {
                ...state
            }
        case UPDATE_GLIDER:
            // console.log(action.gliderID)

            return {
                ...state
            }
        default:
            return state
    }
}

export default builderReducer
